scripts.build: npm i && tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-snapkit && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-snapkit && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo-ng/typings!'
scripts.generate.typings.android: echo 'Download from https://github.com/Snap-Kit/release-maven/tree/repo/com/snapchat/kit/sdk' && java -jar ../../android-dts-generator/dts-generator/build/libs/dts-generator.jar -input ./classes.jar -output platforms/android/typings && rimraf classes.jar && echo '##### Done! Deleted src/classes.jar, and generated typings in src/platforms/android/typings'
